message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to the game!
I'll give you 400k, it's a good starting point, but I'm looking to maximize my gain
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away the farm!
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet. Keep pushing!
I'm not budging much more, but I'm willing to meet you halfway!
I'm getting closer to my target, but I'm willing to give you a bit more to seal the deal
I'm not going to give up yet! I'll meet you in the middle, but that's as low as I'll go!
